data.name: President Rocket Game
data.detailed_description:
Help ex-president Lloyd The Prez Kinski - an arch conservative hypocrite and chauvinist - get a seat on board of the maiden flight of german tech mogul Daniel Brunners new rocket. What the hell could go wrong?

Planned features

  • A classic point & click adventure in a retroish pixel art design (a little lighting never hurt anyone, eh?) with full english voice over
  • Try to lead The Prez (and two other playable characters) through an absurd story packed with crazy events, that begins to unfold in a german bar and hopefully ends on board of a rocket bound for the sun
  • The Prez doesn't like to be controlled. In fact, he hates it! And it's YOUR job to deal with that. Luckily for you, he won’t be the only playable character in the game!
  • Experience a world full of mad characters, crazy events and bizarre locations, that has more to offer than you would expect
  • Help The Prez make it through nerve wrecking and entertaining dialogs. He won't won't let you get away with everything you want him to say, though.
  • Exciting and sometimes unusual puzzles with alternative solutions and a story with meaningful decisions promise replayability
  • Never before was death in adventure games funnier. Or fun at all. Dying in President Rocket Game is so pleasing, we'll actually add achievements for it while sparing you quick saving frenzies

data.short_description: Help ex-president Lloyd The Prez Kinski - an arch conservative hypocrite and chauvinist - get a seat on board of the maiden flight of german tech mogul Daniel Brunners new rocket. What the hell could go wrong?
data.supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Contains references to an excessive use of alcohol, mild violence and a generous range of strong language.
